keyPolicies.policyDescription: The SNP has delivered the Road Equivalent Tariff (RET), which lowered ferry fares, benefiting the Islands.

issues.environment: Angus was involved in the campaign to improve the fuel duty differential for the Western Isles.
issues.governance: Angus worked successfully for lifting unnecessary and contentious parts to be removed from the proposed crofting reform bill.

housing.content: The SNP has a plan to build a thousand new homes each year across Scotland to help young and old alike.

contactInformation.address: SNP Campaign HQ, 83 Cromwell St, Stornoway, HS1 2DH

endorsements.endorsement: This leaflet is about who becomes the MP for the Western Isles. Angus is a highly energetic MP - and rightly has your support.

quotes.text: "For RET - It has to be SNP"

images.caption: Angus Brendan MacNeil working for the Western Isles

leaflet.additionalNotes: Angus MacNeil pledges to retain essential services, supports the SNP's plan for independence, and is committed to representing the Western Isles effectively in the Parliament.
